original_title: How to Juggle & Other Cheap Tricks with Marty Pollio
overview: Comedian Marty Pollio shows you juggling basics and simple magic tricks to amuse yourself and friends in this fun program filled with insights and helpful hints. Whether you're a novice or experienced hand, you'll never drop the ball again. Magician Lance Burton makes a special appearance as Pollio demonstrates goofy magic tricks to add to your entertainment repertoire.
title: How to Juggle & Other Cheap Tricks with Marty Pollio
